hero.name: John Doe
hero.tagline: I build things for the web.
hero.description: I'm a software developer specializing in building exceptional digital experiences. Currently, I'm focused on creating accessible, human-centered products.

ecommerce.title: E-Commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: A fully responsive e-commerce platform with product catalog, shopping cart, user authentication, and payment processing integration.

taskApp.title: Task Management App
taskApp.description: A Kanban-style task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, task categories, and real-time updates.

dashboard.title: Social Media Dashboard
dashboard.description: A comprehensive dashboard for social media analytics with interactive charts, metrics tracking, and report generation.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: I'm currently looking for new opportunities. My inbox is always open whether you have a question or just want to say hi!
